Title: Smile
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), David Hoselton, Karen Struck, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: Dr. Shaun Murphy questions the need for an elective surgery that will allow his young patient to smile for the first time. Meanwhile, Dr. Claire Brown and Dr. Morgan Reznick discover that their patient lied about her identity.
